entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
